phrases: How can you not know what your boyfriend's post-graduation plans are?
Well... we never talk about stuff like that.
You are already a senior, but you have not discussed it?
What do you normally talk about then?
Stuff like the upcoming Umibouzu concert...
Or guessing what order he will perform his songs in...
I figured it would be something like that, but...
You have got to be kidding!
Are not your boyfriend's post-graduation plans a source for concern when making your own?
Do you two talk about this stuff with Nakao-chi and Suzuki-kun?
Nakao-chi is going into the family business, running a dessert shop,
I have decided to go to the same university as Suzuki-kun for the time being.
No need to act so surprised!
There is no way you will get in.
Taking entrance exams is not free, you know.
If you become a ronin, it will cost you...
Reconsider before you go wasting your time and money, okay?
You could have at least said, Wow!
You are not cute at all!
I am impressed by your reckless adventurous spirit,
Is that how you really feel, you idiot?!
If I were her, I would be trying to stop you too.
What the hell do you guys take me for?!
Why am I the only one you hit?!
Because you are the most annoying!
I am the type who can do anything if I put my mind to it.
You probably cannot do it even if you put your mind to it.
I am going to try, and I am definitely going to get in.
Did you come to laugh at me some more?
Hey, Otani, why do you want to go to college all of a sudden?
It is not all of a sudden.
Hey, it is old man Otani!
What are you guys doing here?
This old man has to study for exams.
Now hurry up and get lost!
I play basketball with them from time to time.
You mean they play with you.
As a school basketball coach or something, you know?
I think it would be fun.
Are you saying you want to get a teaching certificate?
You want to become a teacher?
I was just giving you an example!
I do like kids and all.
This is why I did not want to tell you.
She is definitely the old man's girlfriend.
I guess that is what they call disparity.
If you want it, come get it!
So Otani wants to become an elementary school teacher.
If he does, it will be hard to tell who is the kid and who is the teacher.
Still, it is nice to see him smile like that.
Half of me thinks it is impossible, but I will still support him.
Nobu-chan, what is this all of a sudden?
No matter how much you enjoyed our trip there...
Grandma's body is deteriorating, so she is going to go and live in the country.
I am going with her to take care of her.
But... what about your mom and dad?
They have both got jobs here, so they cannot go.
She says she has some old friends up there,
Are you okay with this, Nakao?
We will call every day, right?
Nobu-chan and Nakao-chi are going to maintain a long-distance relationship?
Hey Risa, will you come shopping with me after school?
Do not you have to study for the entrance exams?
The undergraduate university in Hokkaido offers entry by referral.
All I need to get in is a high school diploma and an interview.
For not telling you about going to Hokkaido.
In any case, are you really planning on buying all of those?
That is why I came shopping today.
I cannot come back just to shop.
When I told Grandma I would go with her to Hokkaido,
Say, Nobu-chan, your grandma has given you a lot of money over the years, has not she?
That is why, in a sense, I am doing this to repay her.
I love my grandma, after all.
Are you really okay with this?
Nakao-chi is okay with it, too.
He is coming over to have dinner at my place tonight.
We will we are talking about self-assured, strong-willed Nobu-chan, after all.
No matter where she goes, I am sure she has the confidence to do well.
Nakao-chi, I am going to get some more eggs, okay?
Nakao-chi, is this really all right with you?
Is it really all right if I take Nobuko so far away?
I care about you too, Grandma.
I would be worried if you went all by yourself.
I am so happy to have such a wonderful granddaughter.
And she has a such wonderful boyfriend, too.
Grandma's going to perform an act she is saved especially for Nakao-chi!
As the day of Nobu-chan's interview in Hokkaido approached,
Life really is just great, is not it?
It is a pleasure to meet you.
Nakao, what the heck are you doing?!
With Nobu-chan going to Hokkaido, Nakao-chi is probably
Gori-sensei called her to the office just now.
I really do not know what to do with you.
Good thing I walked away with just a scratch.
What do you mean, good thing, you idiot!
I do not have it together?
If you did, you would not have fallen down the stairs!
You have been acting weird lately.
You do not want Nobu-chan to go to Hokkaido, do you?
But it will make Nobu-chan feel bad,
I mean, she is made her final decision and all...
I thought it over for so long...
I gave it so much thought...
Well, you have always been the one to help me...
But now I do not have any advice I can give you.
It is not like was expecting any advice from you, you know.
Then why did you chase after me?
Well I did intend to say something...
I have no idea what you are talking about!
What are you going to say to her?
I am going to settle this.
What is with those glasses, Nakao-chi?
I told you, stop adding the chi after Nakao.
It is unfashionable and out of date these days.
If you want to go, then go by yourself.
I will go with some other girl.
I thought you were going to settle this?
I have never told you this before, but...
Will you knock it off already?
What is up with you, Nakao-chi?
I said I have got three other women!
This is lover number one, Maiko.
What the heck are you doing?!
Your makeup is not done yet!
What are you trying to do?
You should just forget a terrible guy like me, Nobuko.
I will go live in a harem with these lovers of mine.
You are just a bather to me.
What the heck was that disgusting display for?!
I want Nobu-chan to hate me.
If she hates me and forgets about me, she can go to Hokkaido without any worries.
Why did not you tell me about this?!
If you are going to cry about it, do not do things like this!
If you do not want her to leave, just tell her!
I know you went to a lot of trouble to get these,
I thought you had your ears pierced.
I am still going to Hokkaido after all.
It might have been silly, but that little display really got to me.
After having that done for my benefit, I do not really have much choice but to go, do I?
It is thanks to you that I was able to get together with Otani.
What is this, all of a sudden?
I was able to keep trying so hard because you were around.
If I would been on my own, I would probably just have done weird things up until now.
There is a suspicious person over here!
Anyway, if you have thought it over and decided,
You came to the decision to go to Hokkaido yourself, so it will be fine.
It will be fine, so... believe in yourself.
I am sorry I cannot say anything more.
I am the one who should be thanking you.
I have a favor to ask...
Just as Nobu-chan has always been there for me, it is my turn to help her.
I am only going for the interview this time.
They were the first present I ever gave you.
I asked Risa to take me to get them done.
But will not your grandma get mad?
But I will not be able to wear them until the holes close over.
Once I get there, I will wear these every day.
That way, I will not ever forget you.
I love you more than anything in this world.
This is much more embarrassing than a simple do not go.
You are going to have some woman trouble soon.
That is what this baby here just told me.
One is a woman much older than you.
The other is a woman over 170 cm tall,
You are right about the older woman...
I have got to get to work.
And my powers were working properly for once, too...
This short boy would end up having an even bigger impact on us than Nobu-chan,
Koizumi is cheating on me with a short guy from work?!
Who would date a guy that short if they had a choice?
Are you making fun of me?!
